amendment.description: To ensure that the Secretary of Agriculture enforces certain Buy American requirements with respect to fish harvested within United States waters.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3303 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3303 proposed by Senator Roberts for Senator Sullivan to Amendment SA 3224. (consideration: CR S4713-4715; text: CR S4715) To ensure that the Secretary of Agriculture enforces certain Buy American requirements with respect to fish harvested within United States waters.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3303 proposed by Senator Roberts for Senator Sullivan to Amendment SA 3224.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3303 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
